description: Stunning colonial set on nearly half an acre in the heart of Scarsdale. Completely renovated in 2022, this exceptional home features a chef's kitchen with Thermador appliances, wide-plank white oak floors throughout, and a primary suite that rivals any luxury hotel. The professionally landscaped grounds include a heated in-ground pool, bluestone patio, and mature specimen trees offering complete privacy.
